Dear user(s),

please find attached  {{proposal}}.tgz, a file containing the {{numscans}} data files
({{proposal}}_{{firstscan}} to {{proposal}}_{{lastscan}}) and your script files
from your recent experiment {{proposal}} (from {{from_date}} to {{to_date}}) on PANDA.

Please let us know about the quality of the data and your satisfaction with our support.
Do not forget to submit an experimental report, especially if you will ask for further beam time.
Your sample(s) will be stored here until they are safe to send to you.
Please provide a shipping address for the latter case.

If you have further questions concerning this experiment, please ALWAYS include the
proposalnumber ({{proposal}}) in your communication.

Regards,
  The PANDA Team
